tool.name: qiime2 vsearch join-pairs

param.name: demultiplexed_seqs
param.label: demultiplexed_seqs: SampleData[PairedEndSequencesWithQuality]
param.help: [required] The demultiplexed paired-end sequences to be joined.

param.name: truncqual
param.label: truncqual: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [optional] Truncate sequences at the first base with the specified quality score value or lower.

param.name: minlen
param.label: minlen: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [default: 1] Sequences shorter than minlen after truncation are discarded.

param.name: maxns
param.label: maxns: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [optional] Sequences with more than maxns N characters are discarded.

param.name: allowmergestagger
param.label: allowmergestagger: Bool
param.help: [default: No] Allow joining of staggered read pairs.

param.name: minovlen
param.label: minovlen: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [default: 10] Minimum overlap length of forward and reverse reads for joining.

param.name: maxdiffs
param.label: maxdiffs: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [default: 10] Maximum number of mismatches in the forward/reverse read overlap for joining.

param.name: minmergelen
param.label: minmergelen: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [optional] Minimum length of the joined read to be retained.

param.name: maxmergelen
param.label: maxmergelen: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [optional] Maximum length of the joined read to be retained.

param.name: maxee
param.label: maxee: Float % Range(0.0, None)
param.help: [optional] Maximum number of expected errors in the joined read to be retained.

param.name: qmin
param.label: qmin: Int % Range(-5, 2, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 0] The minimum allowed quality score in the input.

param.name: qminout
param.label: qminout: Int % Range(-5, 2, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 0] The minimum allowed quality score to use in output.

param.name: qmax
param.label: qmax: Int % Range(40, 41, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 41] The maximum allowed quality score in the input.

param.name: qmaxout
param.label: qmaxout: Int % Range(40, 41, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 41] The maximum allowed quality score to use in output.

param.name: threads
param.label: threads: Int % Range(0, 8, inclusive_end=True)
param.help: [default: 1] The number of threads to use for computation. Does not scale much past 4 threads.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: vsearch join-pairs =========================== Join paired-end reads.
Outputs: -------- :joined_sequences.qza: The joined sequences.
|
Description: ------------ Join paired-end sequence reads using vsearch's merge_pairs function. The qmin, qminout, qmax, and qmaxout parameters should only need to be modified when working with older fastq sequence data. See the vsearch documentation for details on how paired-end joining is performed, and for more information on the parameters to this method.
|
